info.description: API to retrieve the funds transfer details
info.title: Funds Transfer details

parameters.name: inwardPayType
parameters.description: Identifies the incoming SWIFT payment received direct from Delivery, payments generated by standing orders, and local clearing payments.

get.summary: Retrieves the Funds Transfer details between Customer Accounts

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

get.summary: Retrieves the Inward Funds Transfer details between Customer Accounts

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

get.summary: Retrieves the Outward Funds Transfer details between Customer Accounts

parameters.name: debitAccountId
parameters.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

parameters.name: creditAccountId
parameters.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

fundsTransfer.description: Handle all types of Local and Foreign Currency, Inward, Outward and Onward payments

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

inwardPayType.description: Identifies the incoming SWIFT payment received direct from Delivery, payments generated by standing orders, and local clearing payments.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message

fundsTransfer.description: Handle all types of Local and Foreign Currency, Inward, Outward and Onward payments

transactionType.description: Identifies the transaction type applicable to the transaction being processed, i.e. outward or inward payment. For example: ACPX, OTPX etc.

debitAccountId.description: Indicates the debit account number of the payment or transaction.

debitCurrency.description: Currency of the debit account. For example: USD, EUR etc.

debitAmount.description: Amount to be debited in a payment transaction

debitValueDate.description: Indicates the value date for the debit side of the payment

creditAccountId.description: Credit account identifier of the payment or transaction

creditCurrencyId.description: Specifies the credit currency. For example: USD, EUR etc.

creditAmount.description: Amount to be credited in a payment transaction

requiredCreditValueDate.description: The credit value date i.e. tentative date on which the payment system will process the payment

commissionCode.description: These field control the allocation of Periodic commission where the field COMM.CODE is the trigger for periodic commission and the field CSN.CODE is a system maintained field and hold the commission amount relating to the period band

commissionAmount.description: Amount of commission charged for the payment created with respect to the commission type used.

beneficiaryName.description: Short title or short name of the beneficiary
Short title or short name of the beneficiary

beneficiaryCustomerId.description: Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.
Identifies the Customer who is to be the ultimate receiver of the funds transferred by the sending bank when this Beneficiary is not a bank.
